  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      public String saveGame(String p_fileName, Player p_callPlayer)
      This function is saves the game in a formatted way that can be used afterwards to load.
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - File which will save the game.
      p_callPlayer - Name of the player who wants to save the game.
      Returns:
      Returns the message indicating the status of save game.
